title: Ignota's SCP-3090 Pixel Fanart

-----
Ah yes! Time to be done with Holiday stuff and get back to my list. I went with kinda a blacklight color scheme on this one! wanted to do some bright neon colors.

I like this article! It's fun and kinda goofy but also has thair air of "The Foundation fucking sucks, huh?" that a lot of articles have. Which. Yeah. //Yeah//. I wanted to make the people WATCHING the test pretty visible in this one. I also just tend to find the dynamic between the foundation and GAW objects interesting anyways. They always take things too far.

--I am kinda worried about why she got left alone after that competition though :(-- [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/danger-in-the-manger Not after this tale :)]



+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]

author: IronShears
